title: SMC_CAMTable_REAL_256_1 (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_CAMTable_REAL_256_1 : STRUCT
This
STRUCT
represents an equidistant curve table.
The table can handle 256 elements of type
REAL
.
Note
For information about technical and table units please
see the documentation of
SMC_CAMTable_LREAL_128_1
.

rows.Name: Table
rows.Comment:
Array of slave positions in table units. The array must start with
the slave position related to the master start position and end with
the slave position related to the master end position (seexStartandxEndofMC_CAM_REF).

rows.Name: fEditorMasterMin
rows.Comment: The minimum master value in technical units.

rows.Name: fEditorMasterMax
rows.Comment: The maximum master value in technical units.

rows.Name: fEditorSlaveMin
rows.Comment: The minimum slave value in technical units.

rows.Name: fEditorSlaveMax
rows.Comment: The maximum slave value in technical units.

rows.Name: fTableMasterMin
rows.Comment: The minimum master value in table units.

rows.Name: fTableMasterMax
rows.Comment: The maximum master value in table units.

rows.Name: fTableSlaveMin
rows.Comment: The minimum slave value in table units.

rows.Name: fTableSlaveMax
rows.Comment: The maximum slave value in table units.
